name: Magikarp
flavorText:
In the distant
past, it was
somewhat stronger than the horribly
weak descendants
that exist today.

previous.name: Tauros
previous.flavorText:
When it targets
an enemy, it
charges furiously while whipping its
body with its
long tails.

next.name: Gyarados
next.flavorText:

GYARADOS will burn everything
down, even in a harsh storm.
